report.title: Locations list
report.description: A general purpose list of locations.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations region ON region.location_type_id = #region_location_type_id# AND region.deleted = false AND st_intersects(region.boundary_geom, coalesce(l.boundary_geom, l.centroid_geom)) #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter# #order_by#

param.name: location_type_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of location type ids we want to return results for.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
